description: An Angular component called RecipeCardComponent that displays a recipe card with methods for managing difficulty levels, total cooking time, and image error handling.

classes.name: RecipeCardComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that displays recipe information with methods for calculating difficulty color, total time, and error handling for images.

methods.name: getDifficultyColor
methods.description: Returns the CSS class name based on the recipe difficulty level.

methods.name: getTotalTime
methods.description: Calculates and returns the total cooking time (sum of prep and cook time).

methods.name: onImageError
methods.description: Handles image load errors by replacing the image source with a placeholder SVG.
